name: Mitigation Playbook for Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed scripts to extract sensitive data from the internal network.

action--b3a6224f-7d97-4588-92a0-fc6f3d3f.name: Kill malicious process
action--b3a6224f-7d97-4588-92a0-fc6f3d3f.description: Terminate the script that is executing unauthorized actions.

action--d0a0a236-f3a4-4e67-9dbc-92279f1b.name: Isolate affected host
action--d0a0a236-f3a4-4e67-9dbc-92279f1b.description: Block all incoming connections to the compromised host.

action--c39f80e7-3f2f-4fc4-b1bb-d742c4a4.name: Notify security team
action--c39f80e7-3f2f-4fc4-b1bb-d742c4a4.description: Send a notification about the incident to the security team.

action--f6c4fbf9-2ae5-41da-aec3-8c11a9c1.name: Review system logs
action--f6c4fbf9-2ae5-41da-aec3-8c11a9c1.description: Check the system logs for any suspicious activity related to the incident.

while-condition--f2e9f07b-845a-4c6f-b7a4.name: Perform full system scan
while-condition--f2e9f07b-845a-4c6f-b7a4.description: Conduct a full system scan to detect any remaining threats.

action--f3db1edf-5f41-421f-85f1-1cd3546a.name: Perform full system scan
action--f3db1edf-5f41-421f-85f1-1cd3546a.description: Scan the entire system for threats and save the output to a file.

parallel--5b3422f8-736e-4b52-869f-61226f.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--5b3422f8-736e-4b52-869f-61226f.description: Perform immediate mitigations in parallel to contain the incident.
